📏 How to Measure

👤

Chest/Bust

Measure around the fullest part of your chest/bust, keeping the tape measure level and parallel to the floor.

⭕

Waist

Measure around your natural waistline, which is the narrowest part of your torso, usually just above your belly button.

🔄

Hip

Measure around the fullest part of your hips, approximately 7-9 inches below your natural waistline.

📐

Inseam

Measure from the top of your inner thigh down to where you want the hem to fall.

⚪

Neck

Measure around the base of your neck where a shirt collar would naturally rest.

🦶

Foot Length

Stand on a piece of paper and mark your heel and longest toe. Measure the distance between marks.

Slim Fit

Close-fitting silhouette that follows the body's natural lines. Ideal for a modern, tailored look.

Regular Fit

Classic, comfortable fit with moderate room through the chest and waist. Perfect for everyday wear.

Relaxed Fit

Loose, comfortable fit with extra room throughout. Great for casual, laid-back styling.

  • Generous cut through body

🔣 Care Symbol Guide

🌡️

Washing

Machine wash cold (30°C/86°F)

  • Use cold water to prevent shrinking
  • Turn garment inside out
  • Wash with similar colors
  • Use gentle or delicate cycle
🚫

Bleaching

Do not bleach

  • Avoid chlorine bleach
  • Oxygen bleach may be used sparingly
  • Test on hidden area first
  • Consider color-safe alternatives
🌀

Drying

Tumble dry low heat

  • Use low temperature setting
  • Remove while slightly damp
  • Avoid over-drying
  • Clean lint filter before use
🔥

Ironing

Iron on low to medium heat

  • Use pressing cloth for protection
  • Iron inside out when possible
  • Avoid ironing over prints/embellishments
  • Steam setting recommended
💧

Dry Cleaning

Professional dry clean only when needed

  • Point out stains to cleaner
  • Mention fabric composition
  • Remove immediately after cleaning
  • Air out before wearing
☀️

Line Drying

Hang to dry (preferred method)

  • Shake out wrinkles first
  • Hang in shaded area
  • Use padded hangers
  • Smooth out while damp

📋 Detailed Care Instructions

Step 1: Pre-Treatment

  • Check pockets: Remove all items including tissues and coins
  • Treat stains: Address stains immediately with appropriate stain remover
  • Sort colors: Separate lights, darks, and delicates
  • Check care labels: Verify washing instructions match

Step 2: Washing

  • Water temperature: Cold water (30°C/86°F max)
  • Detergent: Use mild, color-safe detergent
  • Load size: Don't overload the machine
  • Cycle: Gentle or delicate cycle recommended
  • Fabric softener: Use sparingly or avoid for technical fabrics

Step 3: Drying

  • Remove promptly: Don't leave wet clothes in machine
  • Shake out: Reduce wrinkles before drying
  • Hang dry: Best method for longevity
  • Machine dry: Low heat only if necessary
  • Avoid direct sun: Can cause fading and fabric damage

Step 4: Storage

  • Clean before storing: Never store dirty clothes
  • Proper hangers: Use padded or wooden hangers
  • Folding method: Fold along natural lines
  • Ventilation: Store in breathable garment bags
  • Cedar blocks: Natural moth deterrent

🧽 Stain Removal Guide

🩸 Protein Stains (Blood, Sweat)

  • Rinse immediately with cold water
  • Apply enzyme-based pre-treatment
  • Soak for 30 minutes before washing
  • Never use hot water (sets the stain)

🍅 Oil & Grease Stains

  • Blot excess oil (don't rub)
  • Apply cornstarch or baby powder
  • Let sit for 10-15 minutes
  • Brush off and pre-treat with dish soap

🍷 Liquid Stains (Wine, Coffee)

  • Blot immediately with clean cloth
  • Rinse with cold water from back
  • Apply white vinegar solution
  • Wash as soon as possible

🌱 Organic Stains (Grass, Mud)

  • Let mud dry completely, then brush off
  • Pre-treat with liquid detergent
  • Rub gently and let sit for 15 minutes
  • Wash in coldest water safe for fabric

🧵 Fabric-Specific Tips

Cotton

  • Can handle warm water and higher heat
  • May shrink on first wash
  • Iron while slightly damp for best results
  • Pre-shrink before altering

Wool

  • Hand wash or wool cycle only
  • Use wool-specific detergent
  • Never wring or twist
  • Lay flat to dry on towel

Silk

  • Hand wash in cool water
  • Use silk or delicate detergent
  • Never twist or wring
  • Iron on silk setting with press cloth

Synthetic Blends

  • Generally easy care
  • Wash in warm water
  • Low heat drying recommended
  • Remove promptly to prevent wrinkles

✨ Maintenance Tips

Daily Care

  • Air out garments between wears
  • Use garment brush to remove surface dirt
  • Hang properly immediately after wearing
  • Rotate your wardrobe to prevent overuse

Seasonal Maintenance

  • Deep clean before storage
  • Check for needed repairs
  • Professional cleaning for special items
  • Moth prevention for natural fibers

Emergency Care

  • Keep stain removal pen handy
  • Blot spills immediately
  • Never rub stains vigorously
  • Test treatments on hidden areas first
